import "./post.css"; import ThumbUpIcon from "@mui/icons-material/ThumbUp"; import AddCommentIcon from "@mui/icons-material/AddComment"; import ShareIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Share"; import CommentIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Comment"; import { Users } from "../../dummyData"; const Post = ({ post }) => { return (

{Users.filter((user) => user.id === post.userId)[0].username} {post.location && ( <> is at {post.location} )}

{post.date}

{post?.desc}

{post.like}
{post.comment} comments
Like
Comment
Share
); }; export default Post;
